title: Pneumonia Detection using Deep Convolutional Neural network
description: This is a project made to classify chest X-ray images as normal or positive for pneumonia using the VGG19 architecture.

title: Data Analysis and Visualization of Customer Reviews
description: This is a project made to give customers and businesses a comprehensive view of customer preferences and trends using Big Data Analysis.

title: Fill in the Blanks: Image Inpainting & Colorization
description: This is a project made to do task like image inpainting, colorization and denoising using Generative Adversarial Networks and Deep Image Prior Model.

title: Through Wall Activity Recognition System using Wi-Fi
description: This is a project made to capture and identify human activities in a closed room using WiFI data

title: Irrigation Treatment Inference of Cotton Images using Computer Vision
description: This is a project classifies irrigation treatments of cotton iamges based on object segmentation and image analysis techniques

title: Disaster Response System using LoRa Devices
description: This is a project made to develope a robust and fault-tolerant disaster management system for wider network coverage across affected areas.
